name: .EDK File Extension
summary: Learn about .EDK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An EDK file is a disk image file used by Ensoniq KT synthesizers, which were popular in the late 1980s and early 1990s. It contains information, such as sounds, samples, and settings copied from physical disks in the Ensoniq Disk (EDK) format. The EDK format helped musicians using Ensoniq KT synthesizers to streamline sound design by allowing them to quickly access and manipulate unique sounds with the instruments during production and live performances.

content: Ensoniq KT synthesizers were popular in the 1990s but have since been replaced by more advanced instruments. Therefore, the EDK format is deprecated and obscure.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
